mapper.insert: insert into t_mb_metadata_define (device_id, mb_gate_no, mb_fun_code, mb_register_address, device_type, data_name, data_type, data_decode_order, data_unit, data_decimal, data_ratio, data_bit_pos, data_0_display, data_1_display, data_fun ) values (#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mbGateNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mbFunCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mbRegisterAddress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataDecodeOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataDecimal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataBitPos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{data0Display,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data1Display,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataFun,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_mb_metadata_define set device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_name = #{dataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_decode_order = #{dataDecodeOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_unit = #{dataUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_decimal = #{dataDecimal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_ratio = #{dataRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, data_bit_pos = #{dataBitPos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_0_display = #{data0Display,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_1_display = #{data1Display,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_fun = #{dataFun,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mb_gate_no = #{mbGateNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mb_fun_code = #{mbFunCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mb_register_address = #{mbRegisterAddress,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select device_id, mb_gate_no, mb_fun_code, mb_register_address, device_type, data_name, data_type, data_decode_order, data_unit, data_decimal, data_ratio, data_bit_pos, data_0_display, data_1_display, data_fun from t_mb_metadata_define where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mb_gate_no = #{mbGateNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mb_fun_code = #{mbFunCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mb_register_address = #{mbRegisterAddress,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select device_id, mb_gate_no, mb_fun_code, mb_register_address, device_type, data_name, data_type, data_decode_order, data_unit, data_decimal, data_ratio, data_bit_pos, data_0_display, data_1_display, data_fun from t_mb_metadata_define

select device_id, mb_gate_no, mb_fun_code, mb_register_address, device_type, data_name, data_type, data_decode_order, data_unit, data_decimal, data_ratio, data_bit_pos, data_0_display, data_1_display, data_fun from t_mb_metadata_define where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
